# Welcome! <img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7735087/152689508-bf63c011-cf19-4392-b0e2-a2e1f0260153.gif" width="30px">
My name is Stavropoulos Zacharias-Christos and I'm a data analyst. I'm from Greece, living in Athens and always looking to explore new and exciting data related problems. You can find me on <a href = "https://www.linkedin.com/in/zacharias-christos-stavropoulos/"><img src ="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7735087/152690731-d00db766-2d0f-49a9-8028-886bacada092.png" width = "20px"></img></a>, or on <a href = "https://medium.com/@zastavropoulos"><img src ="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7735087/152690873-1fd24062-912a-46c3-a2f1-d6e9e5b10747.png" width = "20px"></img></a>.

# <img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7735087/152691009-674b3611-c220-4091-9ac3-75897eda3ad0.gif" width="30px"> Bloging and sharing
I try to document every step of my journey to become a better data analyst. In my medium blog posts I show you my thought process behind cleaning, exploring, analyzing and visualising data. I also showcase how I learn about new technologies and analysis methods. Follow me for more.
